Detailed Description

LookupAlphaIdExtension provides an extension mechanism which allows registering an object derived from LookupAlphaIdExtension. This derived class then shall overwrite the LookupAlphaId method and implement a lookup algorithm which returns a certain alpha identifier for a phonenumber. This will then be used by the method DataHandler::LookupAlphaId method. Internally APOXI uses this method to resolve for example SMS phonenumbers.
